item.title: 010.Preliminary Qualitative Data Analysis
item.description: Preliminary Analysis see 000.Codebook_vk ethnic return migration see [[010.QualitativeData/020.coding notes]] see 030.Network Images see doing digital migration studies_chp14 Where is this from (source)? Interviewees come from many different countries, and their experiences and life stories differ in many ways. The one thing that they have in common is that all of them have Vietnamese roots, but they were born or raised in Western countries [1] .

item.title: 020.coding notes
item.description: ATLAS.ti 9 project bundle, networks of potential categories, grounded theory methodology paper, and preliminary analysis writing. In Atlas.ti file, there are 753 codes divided by 5 major code groups: Barriers and Enablers of Integration, ICTs, Identity, Making Friends, Motivation for Moving / Staying in Vietnam. In the file “Constructing Grounded Theory_ A Practical Guide through Qualitative Analysis” methodology for constructing grounded theory. In Preliminary Analysis writing, summed up the most interesting findings that occurred.
